articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Saudi Arabia's Al-Nassr banned from signing players over 'outstanding debts' - The Guardian
articles.description: The Saudi Pro League side who signed Cristiano Ronaldo have been blocked from registering new players by Fifa
articles.content:
The Saudi Arabian club Al-Nassr have been banned from registering new players due to outstanding debts, Fifa has said.
Al-Nassr began the influx of football stars to the Saudi Pro League when they s… [+1092 chars]
